articles.author: Scottie Andrew
articles.title: James Earl Jones is hanging up his cape as Darth Vader - CNN
articles.description: Jones is stepping back from recording new dialogue as Darth Vader, but did sign off on Lucasfilm's plans to recreate his voice using AI for future "Star Wars" projects, which is how his voice was used in "Obi-Wan Kenobi," Vanity Fair reported.
articles.content:
James Earl Jones, who for decades has provided Darth Vaders iconic, menacing voice, will not record new lines for new Star Wars projects. 
Instead, Jones voice will live on artificially through an A… [+1873 chars]
